author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
E.ON, fair merchant of light and heat,
Warns of a cut in their earnings neat.
"A price reduction for gas and flame,
Yet our investment plans stand the same."

Swift be the changes in bonds so grand,
Eurozone markets like shifting sand.
As year's end looms, liquidity shrinks,
Unsteady footing on which one thinks.

Farmer Bill of the Bayer domain,
Rules o'er crops and health with steady rein.
He ponders division, to split or not,
Yet, three parts from one he would fain allot.

feedItems.title: E.ON Warns of Earnings Hit From Price Reductions
feedItems.description: E.ON said it expected fourth-quarter earnings to suffer the impact of price reductions for electricity and gas customers, but confirmed its full-year guidance and said it planned to invest more than €6 billion in 2023.

feedItems.title: Declining Liquidity Adds to Fluctuations in Eurozone Government-Bond Markets
feedItems.description: Swift fluctuations in eurozone government-bond markets these days are probably exacerbated by the fact that liquidity is starting to decline as the end of the year is approaching, UniCredit Research said.

feedItems.title: Bayer Mulls Possible Split of Crops or Consumer Health
feedItems.description: Bayer CEO Bill Anderson said he is looking at various structural options for the company but ruled out splitting the group into three businesses.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the land where winter breath doth freeze,
Gov. Beshear, like Ullr with his skis,
Holds strong 'gainst Republicans, like sea 'gainst cliff,
In Virginia's strife, Democrats offer relief.

In the city of Angels, a scene fraught with dread,
A Jewish elder falls, full altered and bled.
Protests clash like Ragnarok in full fury,
A potential death scribed in the Norns' jury.

Goldman now shuns the lender's game,
Shedding the GM card with unspoken shame.
Like Thor casting out his trusted Mjolnir,
From consumer lending they retract in fear.

feedItems.title: Democratic Gov. Beshear won re-election in Kentucky, and Democrats in Virginia prevented full Republican control of the state government.
feedItems.description: Democratic Gov. Beshear won re-election in Kentucky, and Democrats in Virginia prevented full Republican control of the state government.

feedItems.title: Police are investigating the death of a 69-year-old Jewish man as a possible homicide following an altercation at dual pro-Israeli and pro-Palestinian demonstrations near Los Angeles.
feedItems.description: Police are investigating the death of a 69-year-old Jewish man as a possible homicide following an altercation at dual pro-Israeli and pro-Palestinian demonstrations near Los Angeles.

feedItems.title: Goldman plans to begin a process to unload its GM credit-card program in another step away from its failed foray into consumer lending.
feedItems.description: Goldman plans to begin a process to unload its GM credit-card program in another step away from its failed foray into consumer lending.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In realm of gold and sable kings, a play of commerce unfolds,
Where banks, 'neath mountainous debt, seek refuge in private hold,
By quill and parchment, trade is stirred, bedecked in terms untold,
Yet o're this stage of lucre's dance, suspicion's gaze takes hold.

Rivian, fair maiden of electric dreams, sings a hopeful paean,
For losses wane, and production's flame does brighten with each span;
Long years of storm, and trial, now seem but a flickering illusion,
Her pledge, a lighthouse beaming through time's confounding confusion.

In fair Ohio's verdant fields, a choice has been decreed,
A woman's hallowed sovereignty in the constitution's creed.
A testament to shifts of thought in fevered electoral seasons,
A rights' battle vanguard, 'gainst next year's tidal reasons.

feedItems.title: U.S. banks are selling complex debt instruments to private-fund managers as a way to reduce regulatory capital charges on the loans they make, people familiar with the transactions said.
feedItems.description: U.S. banks are selling complex debt instruments to private-fund managers as a way to reduce regulatory capital charges on the loans they make, people familiar with the transactions said.

feedItems.title: Rivian raised its production forecast for the year and said losses narrowed in the third quarter, as the EV startup tries to increase output after a choppy two-year launch.
feedItems.description: Rivian raised its production forecast for the year and said losses narrowed in the third quarter, as the EV startup tries to increase output after a choppy two-year launch.

feedItems.title: Ohio voters decided to enshrine abortion rights in the state's constitution, the latest test of where voters stand on one of the most consequential issues heading into next year's presidential election.
feedItems.description: Ohio voters decided to enshrine abortion rights in the state’s constitution, the latest test of where voters stand on one of the most consequential issues heading into next year’s presidential election.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
As goats trim the pastures green,
Metal steeds no longer gleam.
Price and discount raised in cheer,
Hoping swift sale is near.

In the land of the rising sun,
Shadowed by Chinese run.
Rabbits look to safer burrows,
Fleeing from the market's sorrows.

The snail, once crowned in halls of lore,
Falls from grace, is no more,
His golden trail of thoughts, fake,
A discovery he did not make.

feedItems.title: Automakers and dealers are slashing prices of electric vehicles and piling on discounts to clear out unsold inventory as sales growth has slowed for battery-powered models.
feedItems.description: Automakers and dealers are slashing prices of electric vehicles and piling on discounts to clear out unsold inventory as sales growth has slowed for battery-powered models.

feedItems.title: Japanese automakers selling fewer EVs in China are looking at whether to cut their losses and focus resources on warding off Chinese rivals in other markets.
feedItems.description: Japanese automakers selling fewer EVs in China are looking at whether to cut their losses and focus resources on warding off Chinese rivals in other markets.

feedItems.title: A physicist whose burgeoning career has been rocked by accusations of plagiarism and professional misconduct had his biggest discovery invalidated by the journal that published the research.
feedItems.description: A physicist whose burgeoning career has been rocked by accusations of plagiarism and professional misconduct had his biggest discovery invalidated by the journal that published the research.
